en: Oregon GIC Lambert (international foot): Lambert Conic Conformal (2SP) (Oregon_GIC_Lambert__international_foot_)
State law defines grid unit as International feet (note: not US Survey feet). For original metric definition (not used by Oregon state agencies) see proj code 13633.
